segments.text: Why do you want to join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The reason for my application for this position is simple . My educational background and professional experience make me qualified for the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any particular conditions that you would like the company to take into consideration ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , just one thing , could you give me some ideas of the pay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What salary do you get for your present position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What starting salary would you expect here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , we pay 3,000 RIB per month . Plus a 20 % commission on all , a company car and other benefits . All travelling expenses will be reimbursed by the company . Do you have any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1
